featured.text: Your dog could fall into one of nine categories: Ace, Stargazer, Maverick, Charmer, Socialite, Protodog, Einstein, Expert, or Renaissance Dog.

definition.zh_def: 一種撲克牌中的牌，通常代表數字1，或在某些遊戲中代表最高點數的牌。
definition.en_def: A playing card with a single symbol, typically representing the number one or the highest value in some games.
definition.example: She played an ace to win the round.
